entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 31. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
